metadata.description:
Original signed oil painting on 30x70cm canvas board. Comes with a signed COA.

Visit: https://nft.slavendizdarevic.com/slaven

Itâ€™s up to you to determine the future of your artwork. Here are your choices:

1 - We burn the token and exchange for physical Olympic Agora Art by Slaven Dizdarevic

2 - We burn the physical painting and you keep the token that can be traded in perpetuity

To unlock the hi-res file (.TIFF) and/or share the address to receive the physical artwork, connect your wallet to our website and follow the instructions.

Description: All the continents come together in a festive celebration of the Olympic Games. The five Olympic rings represent the five continents. The sky above Tokyo is lit up in the colours of these rings and shines down on celebrating couples. Fifteen couples at the forefront of the painting create all possible combinations.
metadata.title: #1 Celebrating the Games
metadata.subtitle: Limited NFT collection of six paintings exhibited in Tokyo 2020 Games
metadata.name: celebration
